name: The Brittle Ones
description:
Story

A brittle, mystical porcelain world is threatened by destruction due to a sudden outbreak of fighting.

A mysterious voice seems to be orchestrating the destruction by changing the stoic nature of the people. Unaffected by her powers, you must confront her as she brings the inhabitants together to fight you.

Gameplay

Remember that you are porcelain, don't let your attackers hit you, but refrain yourself from striking them back, because either way, your body would break under the shock.

To stay intact, timely dodge their attacks to make them smash themselves on the wrong target.

Don't forget to repair the cracks in your body in the gold pools you will find on your way.

Controls

The game requires a gamepad controller to play.

The Brittles

The Brittle Ones is a game project for which we've developed a vertical slice during our second year in the CNAM-ENJMIN school.

The project took 4 months and 11 talented students who worked with the Unreal Engine, Maya and Wwise.
